Package com.i2group.apollo.service.common

Contains interfaces and classes that all the standard i2 Analyze services use.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccessPermissionDeniedException.Fault
    Contains information about the enclosing AccessPermissionDeniedException.
    DataSourceOutOfDateException.Fault
    Contains information about the enclosing DataSourceOutOfDateException.
    DeletionStatusException.Fault
    Contains information about the enclosing DeletionStatusException.
    GrantPermissionDeniedException.Fault
    Contains information about the enclosing GrantPermissionDeniedException.
    InvalidArgumentException.Fault
    Contains information about the enclosing InvalidArgumentException.
    ItemNotFoundException.Fault
    Contains information about the enclosing ItemNotFoundException.
    ItemSupplantedException.Fault
    Contains information about the enclosing ItemSupplantedException.
    PermissionDeniedException.Fault
    Contains information about the enclosing PermissionDeniedException.
    RequestTooLargeException.Fault
    Contains information about the enclosing RequestTooLargeException.
    SetSizeExceededException.Fault
    Contains information about the enclosing SetSizeExceededException.
    ValidationException.Fault
    Contains information about the enclosing ValidationException.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AccessPermissionDeniedException
    The exception raised when a service method tries to perform an operation for which the current user has insufficient access permissions.
    DataSourceOutOfDateException
    The exception raised when a service method provides a DataSource version that does not match the current version.
    DeletionStatusException
    The exception raised when a service method tries to act upon an Item that is marked as deleted, or tries to undelete an Item that is not marked as deleted.
    GrantPermissionDeniedException
    The exception raised when a service method tries to perform an operation for which the current user has insufficient grant permissions.
    InvalidArgumentException
    The exception raised when a service method receives an invalid argument.
    ItemNotFoundException
    The exception raised when a service method cannot find the requested Item, because either it does not exist or the current user cannot see it.
    ItemSupplantedException
    The exception raised when a service method tries to act upon an Item that has been supplanted through acting as the source in a merge operation.
    PermissionDeniedException
    A generic representation for AccessPermissionDeniedExceptions and GrantPermissionDeniedExceptions that provides the features common to both.
    RequestTooLargeException
    The exception raised when a service method tries to perform an operation on too many Items in the same call.
    SetSizeExceededException
    The exception raised when a service method attempts to search a set that is too large.
    ValidationException
    The exception raised when a general validation error occurs.

Package com.i2group.apollo.service.common Description

Contains interfaces and classes that all the standard i2 Analyze services use.
Since:
2.0
